data.name: First Assault - MegaTech Crate
data.detailed_description:
Crate Contents


About the Game

From the manufactures of the highly popular Class-A prosthetic bodies. Start your experience off strong with the MegaTech Crate! This crate introduces Togusa’s Signature Skin, inspired by the TV series, alongside his trusty Mateba. Dive into the game with the Seburo MG and start eliminating cyber terrorists. Use the 30-day Section 9 Pass and GP to expand your weapons arsenal and augment your operative with chipsets!

MegaTech Crate Contents:
  • Togusa: Signature Skin
  • Operative License x1
  • Mateba
  • Seburo MG
  • Section 9 Pass (30 Days)
  • 500,000 GP

Limit 1 MegaTech Crate Per Account. Crates Are Not Transferable.
This Crate is Only Available in Supported Regions.

data.short_description: From the manufactures of the highly popular Class-A prosthetic bodies.  Start your experience off strong with the Megatech Crate! This crate introduces Togusa’s Signature Skin, inspired by the TV series, alongside his trusty Mateba.

fullgame.name: Ghost in the Shell: Stand Alone Complex - First Assault Online

data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Polish, Portuguese-Brazil, Turkish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64bit or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 260
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 or higher compatible sound card or on board processor
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 64bit or later
  • Processor: Intel i5 2500 3.3 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 450
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 or higher compatible sound card or on board processor
